website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight, breathable bamboo gloves with a tough nitrile coating. Come as a 3-pack – exceptional value for the money.
pros: Flexible enough for tasks that require a light touch but durable enough to protect from scratches and thorns
Users can't fault their unbeatable value
cons: Some people might not want a pack of 3, though it's good to have a backup

customer_reviews.title: These run big so I would plan on ordering a ...
customer_reviews.text: These run big so I would plan on ordering a size down, especially because you want your gloves to have a tight, snug fit. The most important and helpful feature of these gloves would be the non-slip black material that continues up to the back of your hand. This keeps dirt from going under your fingernails which happens with a lot of other gardening gloves I’ve tried.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonmom

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and allows for good finger control
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with these gloves! The material is nice and stretchy, so it stays on and allows better finger control than the fabric gloves I have used in the past. They are also more comfortable. The Nitrile coating is very strong and protective! I tested it on my rosebush, and the thorn broke without penetrating the glove! I wear a size medium in disposable gloves, so I ordered a medium for these. They fit well and would probably stretch comfortably if my hands were bigger, but they are by no means loose.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: No loss of hand dexterity - very flexible.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these gloves for a gardening project but used them before that when cleaning my wrought iron porch railing. The gloves were so flexible that it was like not wearing anything at all and my hands were totally clean after a really nasty project. Moisture and cleaner did not get through to my hands. There was zero loss of dexterity and the gloves also held up very well during extreme scrubbing. I can see using these gloves for all outdoor projects just to save my hands from scrapes and messy clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Knittermam

customer_reviews.title: Great for Working in the Christmas Tree Tent
customer_reviews.text: Our church hosts a Christmas tree lot for Buy a Tree Change a Life.100% of the proceeds go to help kids globally and locally. Just about everyone in the church volunteers for a few shifts in the tree lot. Last year, my hands got all cut up because I didn't have good gloves. This year I am ready. I do wish I had ordered large instead of medium, so that I could share my gloves with the guys, but these will be great for volunteering in the tree tent!
customer_reviews.author: Mom Maven

customer_reviews.title: Good Gardening Gloves for your Green Thumbs
customer_reviews.text: Love using these gloves when caring for my plants. Have just been using them so far with house plants but Spring is coming and I'm enjoying the protection they give so much I know I'll like them when I get out to my garden. The colors are fun and they are made very well. I always like Vremi products, they have such good products that are a pleasure to use. I would purchase these again once these wear out, but I expect they'll last through Summer and into the Fall and beyond. Try these out, I think you'll like them.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra~

customer_reviews.title: Decent gloves - get stretched and sloppy after a day though.
customer_reviews.text: Good buy. Holding up well to rigorous gardening. They STRETCH out after about a day. It's possible washing will make these snap back, but after a day of use they're getting pretty sloppy. This stretch isn't a problem for general gardening work; but if you wanted more precise handling, I'd keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Hoffman Family

customer_reviews.title: These have been amazing. They are comfortable and durable
customer_reviews.text: A lot of my yard work includes dealing with rough branches, not just gardening in soft dirt. These have been amazing. They are comfortable and durable. I was trying to use canvas glove but they were too bulky for the small plants. I did order a size up (medium instead of small) and they fit great!
customer_reviews.author: AeKeenan

customer_reviews.title: Great household protectors.
customer_reviews.text: These are great for working in the garden, or using any tool when you want to protect your hands. Since the three pair are in different colors, it is easy for me to remember which pair I need to use for the job I'm going to be doing. That way I don't mix the indoor gloves, with the ones I to use outdoors.The gloves are think enough to provide protection and yet allow for finger dexterity when you need to pick up small parts.
customer_reviews.author: Kymara

customer_reviews.title: These are great gardening and work gloves!
customer_reviews.text: They fit well, are strong and protect me from rose thorns. Thistles seem to get in a little.... However, overall great quality and I am glad I chose these, because some others I have purchased have been a disappointment, wearing out quickly. These seem much more sturdy. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Mt. Tam Hiker

customer_reviews.title: Very form fitting for big hands, yet easy on and off. Awesome price.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Love them. I have "big hands for a woman" and have absolutely no issues with these. Very form fitting, yet easy on and off. Getting a 3-pack for this price is excellent. Now if they get wet or too muddy while gardening, I can change them out for a dry pair and keep going in comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Ritter

customer_reviews.title: Great value for such durable gloves
customer_reviews.text: I’m always rough on my gloves from working in the yard & digging in the dirt but these are really pretty strong. And I can feel what I’m doing unlike a lot of stronger type materials. Plus this is a great value. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: D O

customer_reviews.title: I really like these gloves
customer_reviews.text: I really like these gloves. I got a medium and they fit really well, nice and snug. My husband tried them on and they fit ok for him just much tighter but usable. They seem like they will hold up really well and they definitely keep my hands from getting, dirty and cut up when I’m working outside.
customer_reviews.author: szero4

customer_reviews.title: Best gloves I've ever had ...
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are so durable! I usually go through gloves like crazy but have been wearing/using these since receipt and still in great shape. They do fit snug ... had to get used to that but now I like it. Definitely recommend these gloves for gardeners that do heavy duty garden/yardwork.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Good fitting gardening gloves
customer_reviews.text: Love these gardening gloves! They’re thicker than standard gloves and much more protective. I ordered a medium for me and large for my husband and they fit pretty well. I don’t love to pull weeds but when I have to, I definitely want my hands protected.
customer_reviews.author: Donna W.

customer_reviews.title: Love these gloves!!
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are very durable and can be used for most chores and projects around the house. They are not waterproof so your hands will get wet if you work with liquids.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Even small thorns go right through these. Sometimes just ...
customer_reviews.text: Even small thorns go right through these. Sometimes just debris from roots, rocks, or sticks would poke right through the glove. Totally defeats the purpose of having these unless you are only working in soil.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: These are such a good value! Our family participated in a service project in the neighborhood and we were able to use these gloves when raking and bagging leaves, gathering broken branches, and more. They fit both me and my two sons.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Missing pair!
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as 3 pairs and box says 3 pairs but I only received 2 pairs in the box! I unfortunately needed them right away, so will not be returning... but I am not happy that there were just 2 pairs.
customer_reviews.author: LCT1933

customer_reviews.title: These are not gardening gloves
customer_reviews.text: These are mechanics gloves not gardening gloves. Large and small thorns penetrate the rubber and poke the wearer's skin. They're only useful if you need gloves that grip well.
customer_reviews.author: Booyah

customer_reviews.title: Love these gloves!
customer_reviews.text: I have allergie to weeds and some latex, and these gloves work great for me. I’m very excited to be able to work in my garden without skin issues!
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, not durable
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Reasonably priced, comfortable, and a pretty good fit (I have long skinny hands.) Con: These things don't hold up long. Used strictly for pulling weeds in my veggie garden. After a few hours of work the rubber on the fingertips had worn through leaving holes. So if you want disposable gloves, these would be a good choice. Just don't expect them to last very long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great grip. Very durable. Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Great grip. Very durable. Good deal. I’d recommend for any serious gardener
customer_reviews.author: DonCon

customer_reviews.title: Great so far’
customer_reviews.text: Got these two days ago. Great fit, w/med. Bright colors. Sturdy but not bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Cherokee Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Seem to be good for fishing and weeding
customer_reviews.text: I'm using these for weeding and fishing. They are pretty comfortable, stretchy and seem to protect my hands well. I'm giving a pair to my kid to use in helping. I gave a pair to my mom and she really likes them. She says they fit great.
customer_reviews.author: TheBlueAnura

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed these gloves very much. They fit better than I expected! I used them to plant some flowers in my new place and they worked perfectly. I really liked the flexibility of the gloves and the cool colors of them, unlike the ones that you buy from the home improvement stores.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Stackowitz

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: Best work gloves i have ever owned. And you get three pair? Super bargain
customer_reviews.author: damion saucier

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: great for pulling weeds. Usually wear a hole in my gloves pretty quickly. These have outlasted all the others I’ve tried and they are still going.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: These gloves are great! They are heavy duty but thin enough I ...
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are great! They are heavy duty but thin enough I can still grab roots and weeds out of the garden. Pretty versatile, as I can wear them and so can my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Chrisdee24

customer_reviews.title: Not much protection when pruning.
customer_reviews.text: These gloves were purchased to help keep the stickers and thorns from my hands when pruning. They do not protect well enough for what I purchased them for. As for general gardening, they are fine.
customer_reviews.author: Butterfly Lady

customer_reviews.title: Love these gloves
customer_reviews.text: Love these gloves! I'm in my little garden every week and these work so well. I can put weeds and sift through dirt and drop seeds. I rinse them and leave them to air dry and they don't cracked or shrivel up.
customer_reviews.author: MILANI

customer_reviews.title: Not that comfortable in the hand. During summer - it can bring lot of sweat
customer_reviews.text: Not that comfortable in the hand. During summer - it can bring lot of sweat
customer_reviews.author: Ashu Sharma

customer_reviews.title: GOOD QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: GREAT FOR THE PRICE. COMFORTABLE AND FUN COLORS! THE MEDIUM IS COMFORTABLE FOR ME - USUALLY A SIZE MEDIUM.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I found the perfect gardening
customer_reviews.text: After the Hurricanes we had a lot to clean up and these gloves were much needed. Very durable with breathable material. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Azure

customer_reviews.title: Works for a week
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for a week for working with produce, after that they started falling apart, the fabric and the rubber
customer_reviews.author: Alex Kincaid

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for both my husband and I
customer_reviews.text: Great fit for both my husband and I! The rubber has a great grip and we use them for all sorts of home improvement projects around the house. Definitely recommend these if you looking for gloves!
customer_reviews.author: Matt and Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great, heavy duty gardening gloves
customer_reviews.text: Great, heavy duty gardening gloves! I’ve owned many gardening gloves over the years and these have been my favorite so far. They fit well and are comfortable and hold up well!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Rentzel

customer_reviews.title: Good gardening gloves
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves for pulling weeds in my backyard. I'd recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Emersome Angeltoes

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Great for all kinds of work on the farm. Hands sweat little bit more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves!!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are FANTASTIC! They are thick and comfortable. They are great quality and do not get "wet" when working in the dirt. They fit perfectly. I have several pairs of garden gloves and these are my preferred pair. I will grab them first over the others.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Cortez

customer_reviews.title: puncture proof gloves and they fit!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves seem to be puncture proof (so far) from the thorns on my rose bushes. I just have to remember to wear them!
customer_reviews.author: NancyE

customer_reviews.title: Love the new fabric!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second set that I ordered.I love the new fabric with bamboo it dries faster.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle K

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy gardening again.
customer_reviews.text: I hate it when i get poked with thornes while gardenijng. These gloves are a great help. The thistle and other stickers stay away and dont poke through the gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Merlynn Davis

customer_reviews.title: Allow for good grip on gardening tools
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are comfortable and allow for a good grip on gardening tools. They do run large. The colors make these easy to spot out in the garden.
customer_reviews.author: TrykaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: DURABLE!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted and expected! Multiple uses and never a problem. They don't stretch out and they dry easily.
customer_reviews.author: anna steinbis

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I love that it comes in multiple colors to match that day's mood...husband probably cares more that they protect his hands. So far, he's cut down a couple trees, and cleaned up and redone the entire backyard. No nicks or cuts yet, so the gloves are obviously doing their job!
customer_reviews.author: Aileen S

customer_reviews.title: Happy gardener here
customer_reviews.text: How cute are these?!?!? They are a good size and have a good grip. Good material and cute colors.
customer_reviews.author: Kwags

customer_reviews.title: They are good for gardening though
customer_reviews.text: One pair of the gloves lining stuck to itself and therefore pulled away on one of the palms. They are good for gardening though.
customer_reviews.author: Firewall Guy

customer_reviews.title: Thick and easy to manuvure
customer_reviews.text: These gloves work great in the garden. I am able to pull weeds that have pricklys on them and they do not go through the gloves. These are durable yet easy to manuvure with them on.
customer_reviews.author: Chance2016

customer_reviews.title: Garden gloves
customer_reviews.text: Good price for 3 sets of gloves. Comfortable and effective.
customer_reviews.author: Georginawynn

customer_reviews.title: They fit well and are made of good material that I beleive is waterproof or at least ...
customer_reviews.text: They fit well and are made of good material that I beleive is waterproof or at least resistant. They are comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: M. Jorgensen

customer_reviews.title: Strong and durable work glove
customer_reviews.text: The coating on these gloves is stronger than most gloves I’ve used. Very comfortable work glove.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand!!!
customer_reviews.text: I continue to be so impressed with this brand. The gloves are absolutely perfect for our wedding and gardening needs.
customer_reviews.author: TheJohnston7

customer_reviews.title: They work great as the fingers are protected
customer_reviews.text: I bought these gloves to use for grinding stained glass. They work great as the fingers are protected. They are not waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: SheilaP

customer_reviews.title: Not for the serious gardener
customer_reviews.text: Fingertips wore out very quickly. Went thru all 3 pairs in the span of a month.
customer_reviews.author: Rindy D. Fairchild

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price! These are easy to put, stay on well, and thick enough to protect my hands from the thistles that will not stop growing in my garden. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Gliot

customer_reviews.title: Best gloves!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best gloves for gardening. The medium fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Super gardening gloves!
customer_reviews.text: These are great gloves. I work in a greenhouse and wear gloves all day. They are comfortable and durable and allow good dexterity. Colors are nice too. Highly recommend these gloves.
customer_reviews.author: MJH

customer_reviews.title: Great value !! Excellent for gardening
customer_reviews.text: Came as described, good value for money. Good for pulling weeds & light/medium gardening.
customer_reviews.author: mitzi s wilkins

customer_reviews.title: Fun in the garden
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren like to help in the kitchen, the crafts, and the garden. These were a great product to protect their hands and mine
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Cargill

customer_reviews.title: Beware - the 3 Pack only contained two pairs
customer_reviews.text: Apart from being shorted a pair, the mediums run large and loose...not typically the case for me. The Pine Tree Tools Bamboo Working Gloves cost three times as much, but represent a better value.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Huber

customer_reviews.title: Good general gloves, but definitely not thorn proof
customer_reviews.text: For the price, they are decent general purpose garden gloves, but don't expect them to protect you from thorns. They are definitely not thorn proof as listed in the title. My husband is still recovering from the multiflora rose stabs he received while wearing the gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Mathieu

customer_reviews.title: Great Garden Glove
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are great. I've had them for over a year now and they really hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: NOT heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my third pair of gloves in the same number of days. They don't hold up working on landscaping. The rubber cracks and I break through the fingertips.
customer_reviews.author: Diane H.

customer_reviews.title: They are great otherwise, but I was wanting gloves that would ...
customer_reviews.text: Argh. I the rose thorns can pierce the gloves. They are great otherwise, but I was wanting gloves that would keep rose thorns from pricking.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Somers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality gloves, comfortable to wear and protected my hands well while gardening.
customer_reviews.author: Mil Besos

customer_reviews.title: Good gloves
customer_reviews.text: Seem to be good, sturdy garden gloves. Next time I'd get a small rather than medium, and I am a large handed woman.
customer_reviews.author: catskill hiker

customer_reviews.title: Great for gripping even smaller branches!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and durable. A lot of my yard work includes hedging and dealing with rough branches, not just gardening small plants. These have been amazing for me. I was trying to use the thick canvas gloves but was having a hard time grabbing everything off the ground when needed. This are thin enough but durable enough to provide a good grip while picking up smaller things from the ground without poking through the glove! I did order a size up (medium instead of small) and I am happy I did.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay B

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: Great packaging! So cute! Product fits like a glove 😉 very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Kfitz

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect glove sizes
customer_reviews.text: I loved the gloves, but when I ordered more they came with only one pair the correct size. Vremi did send replacement but each time the box had only one size small. I won't be ordering from them again
customer_reviews.author: sue

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at the quality of the gloves for the price. I haven't put them through the test of weeding yet, but they fit well and are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Alfy

customer_reviews.title: Unusable
customer_reviews.text: This three pack of gloves included a pair of two left gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit and good grip
customer_reviews.text: Love the grip for handling all types of work - not just for gardening.
customer_reviews.author: LBB

product_meta.title: Vremi Heavy Duty Gardening Gloves for Men and Women - 3 Pack Medium Size Bamboo Nitrile Coated Indoor and Outdoor Garden Gloves for Vegetable Roses or Flower Gardens - Blue Green and Red
product_meta.description:
Need a hand? Try Vremi’s Green Guardian Garden Gloves. While you’re tending to your garden, they’ll keep your digits divine. With soft, breathable bamboo fibers and a puncture resistant nitrile coating, these working gloves with gentle compression ensure that you cut your plants. One set includes three pairs of digging gloves in blue, green, and red for fun, unisex color options in whatever size you choose. Great for home improvement and also suitable as fishing gloves. Perfect for men, women, seniors and kid gardeners alike!

 Product Details and Care 

 *  Includes 3 pairs of Gardening Gloves in red, blue, and green 
 *  SMALL Glove Total Length: 7.5 in. 
 *  MEDIUM Glove Total Length: 7.75 in. 
 *  LARGE Glove Total Length: 8 in. 
 *  SELECT Small, Medium or Large size option BEFORE adding to cart 
 *  Material: Bamboo fiber glove base with protective Nitrile coating 
 *  Care: Hand wash and air dry to clean 
 *  For gardening or auto work 
 *  Do NOT use in kitchen or when handling food
feature_bullets: GLOVES for PREMIUM PROTECTION - 3 pack of garden working gloves to avoid scrapes that every rose gardener endures; thick yet lightweight enough to handle delicate blossoms. Keep hands safe from scratches, dirt, grease or cuts with these digging gloves - perfect for a flower, herb or vegetable garden, or for doing home improvement or auto work

BREATHABLE BAMBOO with NITRILE COATING - Made from bamboo fiber and coated with puncture resistant nitrile for heavy duty protection and maximum comfort. Designed to fit snugly; a nice alternative to standard compression gloves with a strong non-slip grip that prevents fatigue from handling slippery materials

3 PACK FOR BULK BUYS - One set includes blue and green as well as red for cute color options that suit your mood (you can even match them to your flower garden). These soft garden gloves have unisex design and are a perfect gift idea for adults and kids alike, with small, medium and large size options

DURABLE AND MULTI PURPOSE - These natural bamboo gloves are perfect to wear for multiple jobs that might get your hands dirty, such as pruning, weeding and planting outside, cleaning a roof, fixing or changing oil on a car. Their puncture resistant material makes them great fishing gloves too! (Note: Gloves are not suitable for kitchen use)

EASY TO CLEAN AND STORE - These premium quality gloves are an essential addition to your toolbox, and you will be pleased by their unsurpassed durability year after year. Stretchable and can be hand washed with soap and water, and air dried. Very convenient to store in your tool drawers

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars156 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
